card.name: The God that Will Be
card.text: Reveal The God that Will Be from your hand: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain “2, T: Create a colorless Fragment artifact token with ‘T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add C.’” When you cast this spell, exile all other nonland permanents. Flying, trample, indestructible

card.name: Accelerated Training
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Age of Humanity
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, I, II — put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. III — put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Angel of Now
card.text: Flash Flying, first strike When Angel of Now enters the battlefield, until the end of your next turn, you can’t lose the game and your opponents can’t win the game.

card.name: Borrowed Wrath
card.text: Creatures you control gain accelerate until end of turn. Those creatures don’t untap during your next untap step. (After the first combat phase this turn, untap those creatures. There is a second combat phase after the first one.)

card.name: Buried Sentinel
card.text: Whenever Buried Sentinel attacks, untap target creature you control. Unearth W (W: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Clean Ending
card.text: Exile target enchantment, tapped artifact, or tapped creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Critical Moment
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control for each spell that targets it, then counter any number of spells targeting that creature.

card.name: Debt to the Buried
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains 3 life.

card.name: Flickering Echo
card.text: Flying 4WW: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Forced Deceleration
card.text: Remove target attacking or blocking creature from combat. If that creature entered the battlefield this turn, Forced Deceleration deals 4 damage to it.

card.name: Heal All Wounds
card.text: Paradox 5WW (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total.

card.name: Host of Echoes
card.text: Flying Whenever a non-Spirit creature you control leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Impassioned Orator
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Infantry Deployment
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Ixia, the Founder
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value greater than Ixia, the Founder’s power, put a +1/+1 counter on Ixia, the Founder. If you would lose the game, instead exile Ixia, the Founder and your life total becomes equal to her power.

card.name: Ixia’s Pattern
card.text: Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, I, II — put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature. III — attacking creatures gain double strike and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Ixia’s Revision
card.text: For each card type, if you control fewer permanents of that type than an opponent, exile all nonland permanents of that type. You gain 1 life for each permanent exiled this way.

card.name: Mark of the Pattern
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has accelerate. (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap that creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.)

card.name: Meandering Scout
card.text: Whenever Meandering Scout attacks, exile it. Return it to the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking at the beginning of your next declare attackers step.

card.name: Other Selves
card.text: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return them to the battlefield under your control. Alter 2W (2W, Discard this card and another card: Draw two cards.)

card.name: Pattern Archivist
card.text: Whenever you scry one or more cards, you gain that much life.

card.name: Pattern Captain
card.text: Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.) Other creatures you control with accelerate get +2/+2. Whenever Pattern Captain attacks for the first time each turn, untap each creature you control without accelerate.

card.name: Pattern Cleanser
card.text: Lifelink Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.)

card.name: Pattern Glider
card.text: Flying Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.)

card.name: Pattern Guardian
card.text: Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.)

card.name: Pattern Rescuer
card.text: Flash When Pattern Rescuer enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Pattern Salvager
card.text: When Pattern Salvager enters the battlefield, scry 2.

card.name: Pattern Sentry
card.text: Alter 4W (4W, Discard this card and another card: Draw two cards.) When you alter Pattern Sentry or it enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Pattern Sky Patrol
card.text: Flying When Pattern Sky Patrol enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pattern Vanguard
card.text: 2W: Untap Pattern Vanguard.

card.name: Retroactive Charge
card.text: Untap up to three target creatures you control. Those creatures each get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Reverse Death
card.text: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

card.name: Sudden Moves
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Timebreaker Goliath
card.text: Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.) Timebreaker Goliath doesn’t untap during your untap step.

card.name: Timeline Seizer
card.text: When Timeline Seizer enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature until Timeline Seizer leaves the battlefield. Unearth 1W (1W: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Timeline Warden
card.text: Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Traveler’s Key
card.text: Enchant creature 2W: Exile enchanted creature and all Auras attached to it, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control. At the beginning of the next end step, return the other cards exiled this way to the battlefield under their owners’ control attached to that creature.

card.name: Versatile Vanguard
card.text: Whenever Versatile Vanguard attacks, it gains your choice of first strike or lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Veteran Paratrooper
card.text: Flying Whenever Veteran Paratrooper attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Age of Progress
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, I — scry 2. II — draw two cards. III, IV, V, VI, C — untap up to two lands. Spells you cast this turn cost 2 less to cast.

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Blink Drone
card.text: Flash Flying Blink Drone can block only creatures that entered the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Borrowed Wisdom
card.text: Draw three cards. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put three cards from your hand on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Change the Future
card.text: Counter target spell. Scry 2.

card.name: Countdown to the Start
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may exile it. U, Exile Countdown to the Start: If you own four cards named Countdown to the Start in exile, restart the game, leaving in exile all cards in exile. You may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, unless they’re named Countdown to the Start.

card.name: Cyclical Progress
card.text: Create a 1/1 blue Assembly-Worker creature token. It has “U, T, Discard a card: Return target card named Cyclical Progress from your graveyard to your hand.” Draw a card.

card.name: Disrupt Essence
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 2. Alter 2U (2U, Discard this card and another card: Draw two cards.)

card.name: Extratemporal Possession
card.text: Paradox 5UU (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Find Yourself
card.text: Paradox 2UU (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control.

card.name: Future
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library. If it’s a nonland card, it costs 1 less to cast. When Future dies, put it on the bottom of its owner’s library and take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Invert Logic
card.text: Paradox 2U (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1.

card.name: Nilthus, the Last
card.text: When you cast this spell, if your library has no cards in it, you may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. If Nilthus, the Last would be put it into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Nilthus and put them on the bottom of their owner’s library instead.

card.name: Paranoia Cultivator
card.text: 8: Target player mills eight cards.

card.name: Possibility Seer
card.text: Alter 3U (3U, Discard this card and another card: Draw two cards.) When you alter Possibility Seer or it enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Do this before you draw.)

card.name: Precognitive Ploy
card.text: Paradox 2U (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Untap target creature. It gets +0/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Resequence
card.text: This spell has flash as long as you’ve cast another spell this turn. Put target spell or creature on top of its owner’s library.

card.name: Reverse Summoning
card.text: Return target nonland permanent that entered the battlefield this turn to its owner’s hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Rift Passage
card.text: Target creature can’t be blocked this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Riftborn Omniscient
card.text: Once each turn, while you can see one or more cards in your library, you may put one of those cards into your hand. (You can see cards in your library while you’re looking at, revealing, or searching them.)

card.name: Riftborn Serpent
card.text: 4U, Sacrifice an artifact: Riftborn Serpent can’t be blocked this turn.

card.name: Riftborn Titan
card.text: When Riftborn Titan enters the battlefield, return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands. U, Discard a card: Riftborn Titan gains your choice of flying or hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Riftborn Trickster
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay 1. If you do, Riftborn Trickster gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Riftrider Continuum
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, I, II — create a 1/1 blue Drone artifact creature token with flying. III — create Rift Network, a blue enchantment token with “Whenever an opponent is dealt damage, you may draw a card.”

card.text: Flash Paradox 3U (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) T: Add C. Spend this mana only to pay paradox costs.

card.name: Seer’s Prediction
card.text: Choose a card name. Scry 4, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, draw a card.

card.name: Sphinx of Progress
card.text: As long as it’s an extra turn or an additional step or phase, this spell costs 2 less to cast and has flash. Flying At the beginning of each end step, draw a card. If it’s an extra turn, draw three cards instead.

card.text: Counter target noncreature spell. Untap up to three lands.

card.text: Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, I — each opponent loses 2 life. II — each opponent discards a card. III, IV, V, VI, C — each opponent sacrifices a permanent.

card.name: Vashla, Free Spirit
card.text: [+2]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don’t, add RR. [-3]: Each player exiles all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards. [-12]: Each player exiles the top four cards of their library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled with Vashla, Free Spirit without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Age of Titans
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if you control a creature with the greatest power or tied for greatest, I — add GG. II — draw a card. III, IV, V, VI, C — creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Alarm Creeper
card.text: When Alarm Creeper dies, create a 1/1 green Elf creature token with hexproof.

card.name: Alpha Authority
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has hexproof and can’t be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Anachronise
card.text: Put target artifact or enchantment into its owner’s library third from the top.

card.name: Ancient Promises
card.text: Draw a card for each creature card you own in your graveyard or in exile.

card.name: Ancient Raptor
card.text: Ancient Raptor can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Arboreal Echo
card.text: Flash Reach Whenever Arboreal Echo blocks, it gains your choice of deathtouch or indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Atavistic Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Unearth 3G (3G: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Borrowed Life
card.text: Return up to two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Discard two cards at the beginning of your next upkeep.

card.name: Bridled Dreadmaw
card.text: Trample Unearth 3G (3G: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Buried Ambusher
card.text: Flash You may activate Buried Ambusher’s unearth ability any time you could cast an instant. You may activate unearth abilities of cards in your graveyard any time you could cast an instant. Unearth 1G

card.name: Buried Druid
card.text: T: Add C. Unearth 0 (0: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Buried Hunter
card.text: Buried Hunter must be blocked if able. Unearth 5G (5G: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Buried Hydra
card.text: Buried Hydra enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each mana you spent this turn. Unearth XGG (XGG: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Buried Interloper
card.text: When Buried Interloper enters the battlefield, draw a card. Unearth 4G (4G: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Buried Pet
card.text: Deathtouch Unearth 2G (2G: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Buried Sharpshooter
card.text: Whenever Buried Sharpshooter attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying an opponent controls. Unearth 1G (1G: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Commune with the Buried
card.text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dimensional Exploration
card.text: Paradox 5GG (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Hexproof At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Druid of the Outer Reaches
card.text: T: Untap target land.

card.name: Eldritch Evolution
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature’s mana value. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

card.name: Indomitable Echo
card.text: This spell costs 1 less to cast for each time a creature you control attacked this turn. Trample, hexproof

card.name: Inexplicable Jaunt
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Alter 2G (2G, Discard this card and another card: Draw two cards.)

card.name: Invade the Present
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay 2. Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Mists of Time
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

card.name: Origin of Species
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, I, II, III — create a 0/0 green Ooze creature token, then put a put a +1/+1 counter on each Ooze you control. IV — remove all +1/+1 counters from any number of creatures you control, then draw a card for each counter removed this way.

card.name: Outer Reaches Explorer
card.text: When Outer Reaches Explorer attacks for the first time each turn, untap it.

card.name: Past
card.text: You may play cards from your graveyard. When Past or another card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put it on top of your library unless you pay 1.

card.name: Prey Upon
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Rot Elemental
card.text: Reach When Rot Elemental dies, you gain 1 life for each land you control.

card.name: Stampeding Echo
card.text: Trample Whenever Stampeding Echo attacks, you may sacrifice it. If you do, creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Timbermaw Parasites
card.text: Trample G, Discard a land card: Timbermaw Parasites gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Time-Tunnel Wurm
card.text: Trample Whenever Time-Tunnel Wurm attacks, you may return it to its owner’s hand. If you do, create an attacking 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

card.name: Titan of the Outer Reaches
card.text: Alter 3G (3G, Discard this card and another card: Draw two cards.) When you alter Titan of the Outer Reaches or it enters the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Unraveling Boon
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+4. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature or Aura.

card.name: Valchuri Mystic
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Valchuri Mystic, put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it.

card.name: Voracious Archelid
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Voracious Archelid, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Warden of the Outer Reaches
card.text: Each creature you control that’s enchanted or a target of a spell you control has hexproof.

card.name: Whispers of the Buried
card.text: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Ageless Master
card.text: Double strike Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.)

card.name: Anchor Point
card.text: Enchant creature Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead. Exile Anchor Point: Your life total becomes 1 and can’t change this turn.

card.name: Arrive in the Past
card.text: Reveal cards from the bottom of your library until you reveal a nonland permanent card with mana value X or less. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Buried Commander
card.text: Whenever Buried Commander or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. Whenever Buried Commander or another creature you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Buried Necromancer
card.text: Unearth abilities of cards in your graveyard cost 2 less to activate. Unearth BG (BG: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Heretical Outcast
card.text: T: Add G or U. 4GU, T, Sacrifice Heretical Outcast: You gain 3 life and draw three cards.

card.name: Pattern Archangel
card.text: Flying Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control gain your choice of first strike, menace, trample, or lifelink until end of combat.

card.name: Pattern Outlander
card.text: Whenever you cast an spell that targets one or more creatures you control, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.

card.name: Pattern Sergeant
card.text: Accelerate (After the first combat phase on your turn, untap this creature. There is a second combat phase after the first one.) Whenever Pattern Sergeant attacks, attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Portal Seeker
card.text: Haste Paradox 2UR (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Whenever you pay a paradox cost, draw a card. T, Discard a card: Add CC. Spend this mana only to pay paradox costs.

card.name: Reap the Present
card.text: Discard your hand. You may play any number of lands this turn. Until end of turn, play with the top card of your library revealed, and you may play cards from the top of your library.

card.name: Rift Sustainer
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent’s turn, you draw a card and gain 1 life.

card.name: Riftborn Fanatic
card.text: Haste Whenever Riftborn Fanatic or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay 1. If you do, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Riftborn Hypercharger
card.text: Haste Attacking creatures you control have double strike and menace. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice each other creature you control.

card.name: Teferi, Redemption Seeker
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card. Until your next turn, you may cast spells as though they had flash. [-3]: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners’ hands. [-8]: Exile all other nonland permanents. You get an emblem with “You may cast cards you own in exile.”

card.name: Teferi’s Reversion
card.text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners’ hands. Each player chooses up to seven cards in their hand, then shuffles the rest into their library.

card.name: Timeline Manipulator
card.text: Flash Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent’s turn, you may pay 1. If you do, that player loses 1 life and you put a +1/+1 counter on Timeline Manipulator.

card.name: Timeline Protector
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, name a card, then look at the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don’t put the card into your hand, scry 1.

card.name: Trophy Claimer
card.text: Trample Whenever Trophy Claimer attacks, target attacking creature with power 4 or greater must be blocked this combat if able.

card.name: Twist of Fate
card.text: Alter 1UR (1UR, Discard this card and another card: Draw two cards.) When Twist of Fate is put into your graveyard from anywhere, scry 2.

card.name: Undo Extinction
card.text: Return to the battlefield all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Vengeance of Fallen Kings
card.text: When Vengeance of Fallen Kings enters the battlefield from your graveyard, destroy target nonland permanent. Unearth 5BG (5BG: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Xalinu, Master of Rifts
card.text: You may cast spells as though they had flash. Spells you cast have paradox. The paradox cost is equal to their mana cost. (You may those cards without paying their mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay their paradox cost.) Other creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Yubgryn, Resentful Hermit
card.text: [+1]: Mill the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card milled this way into your hand. [-3]: Yubgryn, Resentful Hermit deals damage to target creature equal to the total number of creature cards you own in exile and in your graveyard. [-7]: Each opponent sacrifices half the permanents they control, rounded up.

card.name: Altar to the Unborn
card.text: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color, except to cast spells. T: Add C. You can’t spend this mana to cast a spell that’s one or more colors.

card.name: Baffling Curio
card.text: When Baffling Curio enters the battlefield, scry 2. T, Sacrifice Baffling Curio: Add C.

card.name: Chronicle of the Buried
card.text: T: Mill a card. 6, T, Sacrifice Chronicle of the Buried: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Corroded Bauble
card.text: 1, T, Sacrifice Corroded Bauble: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Disjunction Blade
card.text: Paradox 5 (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Equip 2

card.name: Eternity Engine
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile any number of creatures you control until Eternity Engine leaves the battlefield. At the beginning of your declare attackers step, for each creature card exiled with Eternity Engine, create a token that’s a copy of that card tapped and attacking.

card.name: Ixia’s Circlet
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if a nonland permanent entered the battlefield under your control this turn, scry 1. T, Sacrifice Ixia’s Circlet: Add C. If this mana is spent on a spell with mana value 8 or greater, that spell can’t be countered and you draw a card.

card.name: Kitesail
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying. Equip 2

card.name: Prophetic Prism
card.text: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. 1, T: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Riftborn Battlecruiser
card.text: Flying, trample 0: Riftborn Battlecruiser becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. At the beginning of your next upkeep, exile it unless you pay its crew cost. (This payment doesn’t make it a creature.) Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Riftrider Vessel
card.text: Flying, haste Paradox 4 (You may cast this card without paying its mana cost. If you do, you can’t cast spells until you pay its paradox cost.) Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Watch of Wrong Moments
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, you may sacrifice Watch of Wrong Moments. If you do, counter that spell.

card.name: Buried Necropolis
card.text: You may have Buried Necropolis enter the battlefield tapped. If you don’t, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. T: Add B or G.

card.name: Enigmatic Outpost
card.text: T: Add C. T, Pay 2 life: Add CC. Activate only during your upkeep.

card.name: Marrow Chapel
card.text: You may have Marrow Chapel enter the battlefield tapped. If you don’t, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. T: Add W or B.

card.name: Outer Reaches
card.text: You may have Outer Reaches enter the battlefield tapped. If you don’t, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. T: Add G or U.

card.name: Pattern Stronghold
card.text: You may have Pattern Stronghold enter the battlefield tapped. If you don’t, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. T: Add R or W.

card.name: Riftrider Station
card.text: You may have Riftrider Station enter the battlefield tapped. If you don’t, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. T: Add U or R.

card.name: Timeworn Cavern
card.text: T: Add C. 2B, T: Each player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Timeworn Cliff
card.text: T: Add C. 2R, T: Timeworn Cliff deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Timeworn Plateau
card.text: T: Add C. 1W, T: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Timeworn Riverbed
card.text: T: Add C. 2U, T: Scry 1.

card.name: Timeworn Woodland
card.text: T: Add C. 3G, T: Reveal the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Warped Landscape
card.text: T: Add C. 2, T, Sacrifice Warped Landscape: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
